subject: Policy on issue of Policy Circulars
text: HRr <ev TTTHNf wifearrut SMM Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (3c; Wavt at {13T4TFf HareTa) Fax 91.11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 7-5 W 6, Tae-10 , Ea1 , # fcri-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka_ New Delhi-110075 No. 11014/1 12016-HR-I 27.10.2016 PQLCY CIRCULAR-MSCELLANEQUS GUDELINES (18.12/2016) Sub: Policy on issue of Policy Circulars. In   supersession to the   Policy   Circular-Admin/Finance (77/20121 dated 02.04.2012, following re-classitication of categories for issuance of Policy Circular has been approved by the Competent Authority: 1. Administration 2. Dispute resolution and legal matters 3. Finance & Accounts 4_ Advertisement/media relation/inauguration/sign board/km stone 5, Vigilance 6. Guidelines related to applications/softwares 7 _ Pre-construction, Land Acquisition, Highway Adrinistration, Env, ROB/RUBs. 8_ Public Private Partnership [BOT(Toll) /Annuity] 9 Public Funded [Item Rate/EPC] 10. Consultancy Services 11. Standard documents 12. Road Safety 13.Technology Induction Cell 14. Access permission 15. Quality Assurance 16. Criteria for assessment of concessionaire/contractor/ consultant 17. Commercial operation 18. Miscellaneous Guidelines. 21 Within the subject wise topics, sub-categories of the circulars/guidelines have been indicated. Further sUb-categorisation has been done within a Sub-category for the sake of ease of access to the documents, and clarity. Indexing has been done to arrange the circulars as per the above scheme_ The older circulars which have been clearly superseded through a subsequent order have been discarded. The compilation of circulars /orders under various subjects/sub-categories is enclosed &s Annexure. The same have also been digitized and is available on Intranet (Library website access available to HQs only) under the head Policy Circulars New Search. 7544 6Mwm NHA
